name: VoiceOS
long_description:
Hiring at scale is broken. 

Our solution: Voice AI that instantly interview every applicant â€” holds lifelike interviews tailored to each applicant's unique background. Recruiters see only a curated shortlist as VoiceOS fine-tunes the questions over time. 

The payoff: days-to-hire instead of weeks, slashed overhead, and a recruiting engine that scales as fast as the enterprise.

VoiceOS is setting a new standard for hiring excellence.
